name: Darkness behind the light
description:
Music from Idan Kupferberg 
https://pixabay.com/de/music/uberschrift-idan-kupferberg-space-war-108526/

Sfx created with https://sfxr.me/

Your crew is flying through space while suddenly your engine has a failure and you get stranded next to a Dying Sun. 
As if thats not enough, your ship gets hit by a solar flare wich damages it even further...
Your scanner shows a nearby asteroid ring, which you can reach with your drone to gather recources.
Try to leave this system before the star turns into a black hole and its super nova destorys your ship.

Controles:

+ Space to fly to asteroid ring
+ Mouse move to move the Drone
+ Mouse left click to shoot

(Game is over after super nova)
